synopsis.text:
Duchy Loggervia's former hero, Red, once valiantly battled against the formidable Demon Lord Taraxon as part of the prestigious Hero's Party. However, his life takes a drastic turn when a fellow party member expels him for his perceived lack of skill. Seeking solace and tranquility, Red moves to the serene town of Zoltan, aspiring to open a humble apothecary.

As Red embraces his new life, he crosses paths with Rit, a beautiful adventurer from his past, who reveals herself to be none other than the princess of Duchy Loggervia. Eager to join Red, she requests to live and work alongside him. As they collaborate to establish their apothecary business, Red's secretive past begins to unravel, hinting that his heroic days may not be entirely behind him.

Join Red and Rit in their quest for a peaceful life as they navigate the challenges of running an apothecary, confronting their intertwined pasts, and discovering that sometimes, the most extraordinary adventures await in the unlikeliest of places.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
